translation.en: - [man] I'm here. - [exhaling] Jonas.
- Yes, my love. - [sobs] It hurts.
- I know. - [panting]
I need medicine.
I'm sorry, my love, there's no more time. It has to be now.
translation.es: Lo siento, amor. No queda más tiempo. Tiene que ser ahora.

translation.en: [gasping sobs] Not ready. I'm too weak.
translation.es: No estoy lista. Estoy muy débil.

translation.en: None of us were ever as strong as you.
translation.es: Nunca nadie ha sido tan fuerte como tú.

translation.en: I don't want anyone else to die because of me.
translation.es: No quiero que nadie más muera por causa mía.

translation.en: They'll be hunted... born or unborn.
translation.es: Serán acechados... nacidos o sin nacer.

translation.en: - [groans] - You can give them a fighting chance.
[whispers] I see them.
You did it.
Protect them.
They're here.
- [tires screech outside] - So is he.
- Fight him. - I can't.
So this is how you've been hiding from me?
translation.es: ¿Así es como te has estado escondiendo de mí?

translation.en: Does he know?
You're giving birth.
It's painful. I can feel it.
Whatever he's saying, remember what he has done.
translation.es: Diga lo que diga, recuerda lo que ha hecho.

translation.en: - [woman] Go. - Is that Jonas?
Please.
Tell him I'm looking forward to meeting him.
I love you.
- I love you. - Aw, does he know you're lying?
Stop.
Or is that still our little secret?
Angelica.
I-- I can't do it... not if you're here.
translation.es: No puedo hacerlo... si estás aquí.

translation.en: I will always be here...
just as you will always be here.
Oh, come now, my dear,
how many times have you made that threat?
translation.es: ¿cuántas veces has amenazado con lo mismo?

translation.en: - And we both know you won't do it. - [gasping breaths]
translation.es: Y ambos sabemos que no lo harás.

translation.en: You can't.
You are one of us, and there's still so much work to be done.
translation.es: Eres una de nosotros, y aún hay mucho trabajo por hacer.

translation.en: - You're coming home, with me. - [door opens]
- Give me the gun. - Put the gun down.
translation.es: - Dame el arma. - Baja el arma.

translation.en: Stop her!
[girl whispers] Will, help me.
Will...
help me.
Please.
[whispers] Help me.
Hello? It's your neighbor.
Hey, open up! This is the police!
She can spin for a girl, can't she?
translation.es: Es buena DJ para ser mujer, ¿no?

translation.en: She can spin.
Period.
Sure.
I don't care. I didn't dress for you. I dressed for what is actually cool--
translation.es: No me importa. No me vestí para ti. Mi ropa tiene mucho estilo...

translation.en: Oh, hey, baby. Oh, hey... that set was on fire, man.
translation.es: Hola, nena. Oye... ese set estuvo increíble.

translation.en: Yeah, the vibe was crackin', Riles.
It was like a... like a tight leash around me goolies.
translation.es: Era como una correa apretada alrededor de mis pelotas.

translation.en: Seen a lot of people play here. It doesn't feel like that.
translation.es: He visto a mucha gente tocar aquí. No se siente así.

translation.en: - Thank you. - This is the guy I was telling you about.
translation.es: - Gracias. - Este es el tipo del que te hablé.

translation.en: Everybody calls me Nyx.
Gotta come with us, man. The shit that he has got
translation.es: Tienes que venir con nosotros. La mierda que tiene es tan poderosa

translation.en: has got the power to blow our fuckin' brains out. [chuckles]
translation.es: Tienes que venir con nosotros. La mierda que tiene es tan poderosa que te hará estallar el cerebro.

translation.en: - Sorry, really bad migraine. - I get it. All that energy and emotion.
translation.es: - Lo siento, tengo una jaqueca terrible. - Entiendo, toda esa energía y emoción.

translation.en: Tell him about your freak out in the park.
translation.es: Cuéntale cómo te alteraste en el parque.

translation.en: - Jacks, you fuckin' dick. - No, it's cool, man. Nyx, he gets it.
translation.es: - Jacks, eres un maldito idiota. - No, está bien. Nyxy lo entiende.

translation.en: He said you had a vision.
No, it was too many drugs.
My son?
Tino! Don't do this. Don't do this, I beg of you!
translation.es: ¡Tino! No lo hagas, te lo suplico.

translation.en: I love you! I love you!
- It's too late. - Tino.
Have you come to confess your sins, my son?
translation.es: ¿Viniste a confesar tus pecados, hijo mío?

translation.en: I've come to blow your fucking brains out.
What?
I'm sorry, are we going off script?
Padre, take five.
Lito, what is going on with you?
Yesterday, you were having visions - of suicidal angels... - I'm sorry.
translation.es: Ayer tenías visiones de ángeles suicidas,

translation.en: ...and today you can't remember your lines.
translation.es: y hoy no puedes recordar tus líneas.

translation.en: [softly] Are you OK, baby?
I don't know. I'm not feeling myself today. I don't need you to be yourself.
translation.es: - No lo sé. Hoy no me siento yo mismo. - No necesito que seas tú mismo.

translation.en: I need you to be this guy, Tino El Caído.
translation.es: Necesito que seas este tipo, Tino El Caído.

translation.en: - Right. - El Caído.
- Right, right. OK. - El Caído, cabrón!
- Let's do it. - OK, people!
Let's set up for the close-up right here!
[woman over intercom] Ms. Bak, your brother's assistant called.
translation.es: Srta. Bak, llamó la asistente de su hermano.

translation.en: She said he still wasn't here, and Mr. Yuen has just arrived.
translation.es: Dijo que él aún no está, y que el Sr. Yuen acaba de llegar.

translation.en: I'll meet Mr. Yuen in the conference room.
translation.es: Veré al Sr. Yuen en la sala de conferencias.

translation.en: Ni hao, Mr. Yuen.
You do us a great service with your presence this morning.
translation.es: Nos hace un gran servicio esta mañana con su presencia.

translation.en: - Who are you? - I'm Sun Bak,
translation.es: Nos hace un gran servicio esta mañana con su presencia. - ¿Quién es usted? - Soy Sun Bak,

translation.en: Vice President and Chief Financial Officer.
Ahh. The sister. Where is your brother?
He was... unavoidably detained.
But I will be happy to walk you through our proposal.
translation.es: Pero sería un placer para mí hablarle de nuestra propuesta.

translation.en: Look, I'm here to close.
translation.es: Mire, estoy aquí para cerrar el trato.

translation.en: Women don't close things.
translation.es: Las mujeres no cierran las cosas.

translation.en: They open them.
Excuse me?
[voice echoes] If Joong-Ki is not here, that means Bak is not ready to--
translation.es: Si Joong-Ki no está aquí, eso significa que Bak no está listo para...

translation.en: Tan-Wu! [chuckles] You sly old fox.
Did I see you at Min-Ji's? [continues indistinctly]
Hey, sis, go get us a couple coffees.
translation.es: Oye, hermana, tráenos un par de cafés.

translation.en: Come this way.
My nieces come downstairs, two little birds,
translation.es: Mis sobrinas bajan, como dos pajaritos,

translation.en: they climb onto the couch, and cuddle up in my arms.
translation.es: se suben al sillón, y se acurrucan en mis brazos.

translation.en: Now we're close and all, but we've never done nothing like this in their lives.
translation.es: Nos llevamos bien, pero nunca me abrazan así.

translation.en: We didn't know it yet, but that exact moment,
translation.es: Aún no lo sabíamos, pero en ese mismo momento

translation.en: my sister was at the supermarket, and she started bleeding bad.
translation.es: mi hermana estaba en el supermercado y empezó a sangrar profusamente.

translation.en: Something internal. There was blood everywhere,
translation.es: Parecía algo interno, había sangre por todas partes.

translation.en: and they had to call an ambulance, but my nieces knew.
translation.es: Debieron llamar a una ambulancia, pero mis sobrinas lo supieron.

translation.en: - They knew about my sister. - Knew.
translation.es: - Supieron acerca de mi hermana. - Lo supieron.

translation.en: Somehow they just knew she was in trouble.
translation.es: De alguna manera supieron que estaba en problemas.

translation.en: Limbic resonance.
It's a language older than our species.
translation.es: Idioma más antiguo que nuestra especie.

translation.en: He thinks that's what happened to you in the park,
translation.es: Él cree que eso es lo que te sucedió en el parque

translation.en: and it's all got to do with this chemical, DMT.
translation.es: y tiene que ver con un químico, la DMT.

translation.en: [Nyx] It's a simple molecule present in all living things.
translation.es: Es una simple molécula presente en todo ser vivo. Los científicos dicen que es parte de una red sináptica ecobiológica.

translation.en: Scientists talk about it being part of an eco-biological synaptic network.
translation.es: Los científicos dicen que es parte de una red sináptica ecobiológica.

translation.en: When people take it, they see their birth, their death, worlds beyond this one.
translation.es: Cuando gente la toma, ve su nacimiento, su muerte y otros mundos.

translation.en: They talk of truth...
connection... transcendence.
Dad? Dad, where are the umbrellas? I can't find the umbrellas.
translation.es: ¿Papá? ¿Dónde están los paraguas? No encuentro los paraguas.

translation.en: What do you need an umbrella for?
Please, no jokes. I'm late already.
translation.es: Nada de bromas, por favor. Llego tarde.

translation.en: I have a big meeting, and I can't show up dripping wet.
translation.es: Tengo una reunión importante, no puedo llegar empapada.

translation.en: Umbrellas are upstairs, but you don't need one.
translation.es: Los paraguas están arriba, pero no necesitas uno.

translation.en: Look, the sun is shining. It's going to be a beautiful day.
translation.es: Mira, el sol está brillando. Será un día hermoso.

translation.en: But, I heard it.
Maybe you shouldn't be going to work. It's so close to the wedding.
translation.es: Quizá no debas ir a trabajar. Se acerca la boda.

translation.en: - Dad, you know work is important to me. - I know.
translation.es: - Papá, me importa mi trabajo. - Lo sé.

translation.en: You sent me to university to get a degree, not to find a husband.
translation.es: Fui a la universidad para conseguir un diploma, no un marido.

translation.en: - I know. - I heard thunder, and rain.
translation.es: - Lo sé. - Oí truenos y lluvia.

translation.en: Maybe what you heard was the sound of your father's tears,
translation.es: Quizá lo que oíste fueron las lágrimas de tu padre

translation.en: thinking how soon he is going to have to give his daughter away.
translation.es: al pensar en lo pronto que verá casarse a su hija.

translation.en: I thought you were happy I was getting married.
translation.es: Pensé que te alegraba que me casara.

translation.en: Tears can be happy... and sad.
translation.es: Las lágrimas pueden ser de alegría... y tristeza.

translation.en: We are born into this world the same way we shall leave it:
translation.es: Nacemos en este mundo de la misma manera en que lo dejamos:

translation.en: alone.
Our only comfort, the only presence that remains constant,
translation.es: Nuestro único consuelo, la única presencia que permanece constante,

translation.en: is the love of our Father in heaven.
translation.es: es el amor de nuestro Padre en el cielo.

translation.en: You all right?
Migraine.
I'm like Grandpa Hassan up there.
translation.es: Soy como el abuelo Hassan ahí arriba.

translation.en: Cold and pickled?
I dream big, like he did.
translation.es: Sueño en grande, como hacía él.

translation.en: Nothing petty, like you two.
That's all you'll ever be, petty thieves. Not me.
translation.es: Nunca serán más que eso, rateros insignificantes. Yo no. Mi próximo golpe será enorme. Legendario.

translation.en: My next score is gonna be huge. Legendary.
translation.es: Yo no. Mi próximo golpe será enorme. Legendario.

translation.en: When you hear about it, your dicks are gonna shrivel.
translation.es: Cuando se enteren de él, sus pitos se encogerán.

translation.en: I'm not sure what'll give me more pleasure... the money, or seeing his face.
translation.es: No sé qué me dará más placer. El dinero, o ver la expresión en su rostro.

translation.en: My son.
Why are you so good to me?
You are my one and only mother.
You gave me the light and love in my heart.
translation.es: Me diste la luz y el amor en mi corazón.

translation.en: I have to go.
Goodbye, my zebra.
I have this feeling.
I'm going to have a really good day today.
translation.es: Que hoy tendré un muy buen día.

translation.en: "When the streets are a jungle, there can only be one king."
translation.es: Cuando las calles son una jungla, solo puede haber un rey.

translation.en: [woman moaning] Oh, God.
Good?
- [chuckles] - Did that help honey's headache?
I can't answer that,
because you literally just fucked my brains out.
translation.es: porque literalmente me acabas de descerebrar.

translation.en: And here I always thought that was a figurative expression.
translation.es: Y eso que yo siempre pensaba que solo era una expresión.

translation.en: - Happy Pride. - Happy Pride.
Oh... come on.
It's Shawn. He's asking if I can work the charity box at the show tonight!
translation.es: Es Shawn. Pregunta si puedo trabajar en la caja de donativos del show esta noche.

translation.en: - I sense a costume opportunity. - Ah-- It's for a good cause.
translation.es: Intuyo una oportunidad de disfraz. Para una buena causa.

translation.en: Who are you? Who am I?
Blow your fucking brains out.
Where's that coming from?
Tino El Caído. I'm the fallen one.
translation.es: Tino el Caído. Yo soy el caído.

translation.en: Who am I? I'm Tino El Caído.
I'm the fallen one.
And you're a liar. You're a liar.
I'm Tino El Caído.
I'm Tino El Caído. I'm the fallen one.
translation.es: Soy Tino El Caído, el caído...

translation.en: Diet Coke, please!
translation.es: Una Coca Cola dietética, por favor.

translation.en: What happened in my past nobody knows, not the writers, not the directors.
translation.es: Nadie sabe lo que pasó en mi pasado. Ni los guionistas ni los directores.

translation.en: I'm a man-- Bah! Bah-pah!
A man with a haunted past, that's what the script says.
translation.es: Un hombre atormentado por su pasado, dice el guión.

translation.en: [sighing] What are you doing to me?
Just checking everything is OK.
translation.es: Vengo para ver si todo está bien.

translation.en: - Yeah? - Everything's OK.
I just thought maybe I did something wrong.
translation.es: Solo pensé que quizá hice algo mal.

translation.en: No, no. Please, no. You were great. You were fantastic.
translation.es: Por favor, no. Estuviste genial. Estuviste fantástica.

translation.en: It was me that, you know, I...
translation.es: Fui yo quien, ya sabes, yo...

translation.en: You're just always so perfect.
translation.es: Es que siempre eres tan perfecto.

translation.en: I don't know what is going on with me.
translation.es: No sé qué es lo que me sucede.

translation.en: Maybe there's something that I can help you with?
translation.es: ¿Quizá haya algo en que te pueda ayudar?

translation.en: Wait, wait.
Wait, Cassandra.
There is nothing I'd like more.
translation.es: No hay nada que me gustaría más.

translation.en: If only my heart did not belong to another.
translation.es: Si mi corazón no le perteneciera a otra persona.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
- [sighs] - She's a very lucky woman.
I'm sorry. I...
I'm sorry.
Thank you for coming. It means a lot to us.
translation.es: Gracias por venir. Significa mucho para nosotros.

translation.en: Sorry, Auntie.
Last few days, all he talked about was your father.
translation.es: Los últimos días solo hablaba de tu padre.

translation.en: Saddest day in his life, the day your father died.
translation.es: El día que murió tu padre fue el día más triste de su vida.

translation.en: You should go say hello. We'll wait for you.
translation.es: Deberías pasar a saludarlo. Te esperaremos.

translation.en: Pay your respects. He was your father.
translation.es: Ve a presentar tus respetos. Era tu padre.

translation.en: - Yes? - When are we leaving?
- Right now. - I have to be downtown by nine.
translation.es: - Ahora. - Debo llegar al centro a las nueve.

translation.en: You'll be there long before nine, Ma'am.
translation.es: - Ahora. - Debo llegar al centro a las nueve. Llegará antes de las nueve. Llueva o truene, Van Damn llega a tiempo.

translation.en: Come rain or shine, Van Damn is always on time.
translation.es: Llegará antes de las nueve. Llueva o truene, Van Damn llega a tiempo.

translation.en: - We need to go. - We need more customers.
We're barely covering the cost of gas.
We don't need customers, we need a Facebook page.
- Look at this. - [sighs] Jela.
Every day is the same. Everybody loves Bat Van.
translation.es: Todos los días es lo mismo. Todos quieren ir en el Bat Van.

translation.en: You dumb fucks! No one gives a shit about Van Damn!
translation.es: ¡Idiotas! ¡A nadie le importa el Van Damn!

translation.en: - Maybe he's right. - No.
- Maybe Jean-Claude's time is over. - No! Never!
Come on, Capheus, Van Damme is a man.
translation.es: Vamos, Capheus, Van Damme es un hombre.

translation.en: He doesn't need costumes and gadgets to fight.
translation.es: No necesita disfraces ni aparatos para pelear.

translation.en: He fights with the fist and with his heart.
translation.es: Pelea con los puños y con el corazón.

translation.en: Come on! The Muscles from Brussels never die.
translation.es: ¡Vamos! Los Músculos de Bruselas nunca mueren.

translation.en: Don't forget that.
- Come on. - [speaks foreign language]
- And get us more customers. - I will.
translation.es: - Y consigue más pasajeros. - Lo haré.

translation.en: - [man] Excuse me. - Whoo! [laughs]
Jean Claude is watching over us. Yes, sir, are you going to the city?
translation.es: Jean-Claude nos cuida. Sí, ¿va a la ciudad?

translation.en: - Yes, please. - Then take a seat.
- No, but I've got no money. - Um... Everyone must pay.
translation.es: Pero no tengo dinero. Todos deben pagar.

translation.en: - Here. - What am I supposed to do with this?
translation.es: - Tome. - ¿Qué se supone debo hacer con esto?

translation.en: This is worth more than the fare.
Look, I believe you, but how do I return change out of a chicken?
translation.es: Le creo, pero ¿cómo le doy cambio de una gallina?

translation.en: - Save me an egg. - [chicken squawking]
[woman] Ms. Bak, I have Mr. Jong from Seoul Citibank on the line again.
translation.es: Srta. Bak, de nuevo tengo al Sr. Jong de Citibank en Seúl en la línea.

translation.en: [Sun] Tell Mr. Jong that I'm in a meeting.
translation.es: Dígale al Sr. Jong que estoy en una reunión.

translation.en: Hang on. Riley! Hey!
Me and Nocker have been waitin' for you.
translation.es: Nocker y yo te estábamos esperando.

translation.en: Sorry. I thought you'd gone already.
translation.es: Lo siento. Pensé que ya se habían ido.

translation.en: Nyx has invited us up to his place.
translation.es: Nyx nos invitó a su casa.

translation.en: Oh, look, maybe tomorrow, OK?
Riles, this is important.
Look, this headache is killing me. Tomorrow, OK?
translation.es: Mira, esta jaqueca me está matando. Mañana, ¿sí?

translation.en: OK...
translation.es: De acuerdo. Eso de lo que estuvo hablando

translation.en: The stuff that he's talking about, that is exactly what you need.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Eso de lo que estuvo hablando es exactamente lo que necesitas.

translation.en: - Hi! - Remember your first brownie?
Our first Pride.
translation.es: El primer día de orgullo gay.

translation.en: Your lips... are so... amazing.
My God, we were so high.
- [both giggling] - Oh, my God, we were.
[man] Are you following me?
- Need some delicious, nutritious stuff? - Um...
Maybe this is what you need.
- [man] Yeah. - OK, OK, we'll take one.
[man 1] Yeah. All right.
- [man 2] Go for it. - How much?
You'll never be the same again.
translation.es: No volverás a ser la misma.

translation.en: - OK, OK. OK, OK. - Thank you very much.
Happy journey.
- Happy Pride! - Happy Pride!
But you know what I remember best about that day?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué es lo que más recuerdo de ese día?

translation.en: Hey, y'all, this is the one I've been talking about.
translation.es: Hola, todas, aquí está la de la que les hablé.

translation.en: Wait, I know you. You're the tranny that blogs about politics.
translation.es: Espera, te conozco. Eres la transexual que escribe de política.

translation.en: I totally disagree with what you said about dropping LGBT.
translation.es: Detesto lo que dijiste de dejar el término LGBT.

translation.en: - Hey, come on, relax. It's a party. - We fought hard for that recognition.
translation.es: - Vamos, relájate. Estamos de fiesta. - Luchamos mucho para esa aceptación.

translation.en: I just thought that the distinctions were separating us.
translation.es: Solo pienso que las distinciones nos separan.

translation.en: Bullshit. Just another colonizing male trying to take up any space left to women.
translation.es: Es mierda. Eres otro hombre colonizador intentando ocupar el espacio femenino.

translation.en: Sam, say one more thing about my girlfriend
and I will colonize your face with my fist.
translation.es: colonizaré tu cara con mi puño.

translation.en: - Oh, yeah? - I'm gonna go.
Oh, please. She's a loud-mouth Berkeley bitch.
translation.es: Por favor. Solo es una perra bocona.

translation.en: - Fuck you. - Fuck you!
Hey, No-- Nomi!
Wait! Honey, what is it? You never cry at stuff like that.
translation.es: Cariño, ¿qué pasa? Esas cosas nunca te hacen llorar.

translation.en: I'm not crying because of her.
Then what?
I'm crying because no one's ever defended me before.
translation.es: Lloro porque nunca nadie me ha defendido antes.

translation.en: That's the day I knew I'd always love you.
translation.es: Ese fue el día que supe que siempre te amaría.

translation.en: My Lord Ganesha.
I hope you like this modak.
translation.es: Espero que te guste este modak.

translation.en: I made it especially for you.
I put peanuts on top. [chuckles]
I mean, of course, these gifts come without any attachments or obligations.
translation.es: Desde luego que ofrezco estos obsequios sin condiciones ni obligaciones.

translation.en: I am trying to become a better person.
translation.es: Intento convertirme en una mejor persona.

translation.en: I know I am not important enough to deserve your attention
translation.es: Sé que no soy lo suficientemente importante para merecer tu atención

translation.en: when there are so many terrible things wrong in this world.
translation.es: cuando hay tantas cosas terribles ocurriendo en este mundo.

translation.en: I can't tell you how bad I feel even being here,
translation.es: No puedo decirte cuánto lamento estar aquí,

translation.en: because I know I shouldn't be asking you this.
translation.es: porque sé que no debería pedirte esto.

translation.en: But I have no one else to turn to.
translation.es: Pero no tengo a nadie más a quién acudir.

translation.en: OK, um... this weekend,
I am to marry a very important man, who you probably know, Rajan Rasal.
translation.es: me casaré con un hombre muy importante. Seguramente lo conoces: Rajan Rasal.

translation.en: Um, he is the son of the owner of the pharmaceutical company where I work.
translation.es: Es el hijo del dueño de la empresa farmacéutica donde trabajo.

translation.en: He's very smart and very handsome,
and all the women at the company want desperately to marry him,
translation.es: y todas las mujeres de la compañía se mueren por casarse con él,

translation.en: but he never took an interest in anyone... except me.
translation.es: pero nunca se interesó en nadie... excepto por mí.

translation.en: I should tell you, I have never seen my parents so full of joy
translation.es: Nunca vi a mis padres tan llenos de alegría

translation.en: as when they received his proposal.
translation.es: como cuando recibieron su propuesta de matrimonio.

translation.en: I mean, I thought they were excited when I received my degree from university.
translation.es: Y pensé que estaban emocionados cuando me gradué de la universidad.

translation.en: Maybe you saw my dad, like, dancing around the house.
translation.es: Quizá viste a mi papá bailando por toda la casa.

translation.en: How could I say no?
I mean, Rajan is, according to everyone, including my mom's astrologer,
translation.es: Rajan es, según todos, incluyendo al astrólogo de mi mamá,

translation.en: the perfect husband for me.
Except for one little fact.
I do not love him.
After you left the funeral... Sergei started blowing on about your dad.
translation.es: Después de que te fuiste del entierro, Sergei empezó a hablar sobre tu papá.

translation.en: Said there wasn't a better box man in the world than your dad, now or ever.
translation.es: Dijo que nunca hubo mejor ladrón de cajas fuertes en el mundo.

translation.en: Said the only reason your dad got caught
translation.es: Que la única razón por la que lo atraparon

translation.en: was because he was obsessed with trying to crack an S&D safe.
translation.es: fue porque estaba obsesionado con abrir una caja fuerte S&D.

translation.en: Said they're uncrackable.
Said your father was an idiot for trying.
translation.es: Que tu padre fue un idiota por intentarlo.

translation.en: You sure that gets us in?
Am I sure? You notice the sign outside?
translation.es: ¿Que si estoy seguro? ¿Viste el letrero afuera?

translation.en: See you tomorrow.
Wolfgang? The safe in the house, it's one of them S&D's, isn't it?
translation.es: Wolfgang, la caja fuerte de la casa es una S&D, ¿no?

translation.en: - [dance music playing] - Give 'til it hearts, baby. My box needs filling!
translation.es: Dale algo al corazón, cariño. ¡Necesito que me llenen la caja!

translation.en: Mm, thank you, baby.
- Oh! - Wow, she is amazing.
Neets loves her charity work.
translation.es: A Neets le encanta trabajar para caridad.

translation.en: - Thanks for coming. - Oh, my God, of course.
translation.es: - Gracias por venir. - Cielos, por supuesto.

translation.en: - We're so excited to see your new piece. - A bit nervous about it, actually.
translation.es: - Estamos ansiosas por ver tu nueva obra. - De hecho, estoy un poco nervioso.

translation.en: - Why? - Well, it's kind of a downer.
- So? - This is Pride. People want to feel good.
translation.es: - ¿Y qué? - Es día de orgullo gay. La gente quiere sentirse bien.

translation.en: I don't.
During the '80s, Pride was a funeral march.
translation.es: En los años 80, este día era una marcha fúnebre.

translation.en: I know. I want to remember that. I want to connect to that.
translation.es: Lo sé. Quiero recordarlo. Quiero conectarme con eso.

translation.en: I want to show people how my life and all of this
translation.es: Quiero mostrarle a la gente cómo mi vida y todo esto

translation.en: is made possible by those lives and those deaths.
translation.es: se hizo posible por esas vidas y esas muertes.

translation.en: [man] I walked in the room and saw a man in his early 30s
translation.es: Entré a la habitación y vi a un hombre de unos 30 años

translation.en: who looked like he was 92,
who was skin and bones, who weighed maybe 80 pounds,
translation.es: que era puro hueso y pellejo, debía pesar 35 kilos.

translation.en: who was on a respirator.
[sighs] And, uh... [voice breaking] and he said, he said to me...
"Do me this-- You've gotta do me a favor."
And I said, "Whatever it is, just ask."
And he said, "I can't go on like this."
translation.es: Y él dijo: No puedo continuar así.

translation.en: He said, "You know, I just-- If you could, just carry me up to the roof
translation.es: Dijo: Quizá podrías cargarme hasta el techo

translation.en: and throw me over the... roof."
translation.es: y aventarme desde ahí. Y continuó: Solo peso 35 kilos,

translation.en: He goes, "I only weigh about 80 pounds, and you're strong, you could do it."
translation.es: y aventarme desde ahí. Y continuó: Solo peso 35 kilos, y tú eres fuerte, puedes hacerlo.

translation.en: And then I said, "Jay, I can't do that. You can't ask that of me."
translation.es: Y entonces contesté: Jay, no puedo hacer eso. No puedes pedirme eso.

translation.en: And when he died, they came in... in hazmat... [voice breaks] suits,
translation.es: Y cuando murió, llegaron ellos... con trajes de protección,

translation.en: and they put him in a body bag.
translation.es: y lo pusieron dentro de una bolsa para cadáveres.

translation.en: It's like I was there.
translation.es: Es como si hubiera estado ahí.

translation.en: I could feel the wind coming in through the broken windows.
translation.es: Pude sentir el viento entrar por las ventanas rotas.

translation.en: The smell of burnt mattress. It didn't seem like a dream.
translation.es: El olor a colchón quemado. No parecía un sueño.

translation.en: Maybe you were astro-projecting, like Dr. Strange.
translation.es: Quizá te proyectaste astralmente, como el Dr. Extraño.

translation.en: Why would I expect anything different from you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué esperaría algo diferente de ti?

translation.en: - Officer Strange. - Fuck off.
translation.es: - Oficial Extraño. - Vete a la mierda.

translation.en: Officer Strange. Whoo! That's your name.
translation.es: Oficial Extraño. Ese es tu nombre.

translation.en: Every time I come down here,
I remember how much you can actually feel how much they hate us.
translation.es: recuerdo la forma en que se siente cuánto nos detestan.

translation.en: Gangbangers hate cops, cops hate gangbangers. It's natural.
translation.es: Ellos nos odian. Nosotros los odiamos. Es natural.

translation.en: How's that natural?
Like dogs hate cats. They're the enemy.
translation.es: Como los perros, que odian a los gatos. Son enemigos.

translation.en: You certainly got plenty of reason to hate them.
After what they did to your old man?
translation.es: Con lo que le hicieron a tu viejo.

translation.en: Shit, I'd never forgive something like that.
translation.es: Mierda, yo nunca perdonaría algo así.

translation.en: [man over radio] One-Adam-12, we have a report of gunfire.
Eleven-12, 10-4.
With any luck, there'll be a few less cats in the world.
translation.es: Si tenemos suerte, quedarán menos gatos en el mundo.

translation.en: - Let's get 'em, cowboy. - [siren wailing]
Open sesame.
Was that a siren?
Huh? Didn't hear anything.
You know I brought a drill.
There's no shame in drilling.
translation.es: No tiene nada de malo taladrar.

translation.en: Shots fired. Requesting backup.
Help me.
- [man] What happened? - [boy panting]
Gunshot wound. Looks like a hollow point.
translation.es: Herida de bala. Parece de punta hueca.

translation.en: - Get an ambulance. - What?
- You heard me. - What do you think this is, TV?
translation.es: - Me oíste. - ¿Piensas que esto es la televisión?

translation.en: Ain't no ambulance coming to Chi-raq for a gunshot.
translation.es: No vendrán ambulancias a ChIrak por una herida de bala.

translation.en: Not fast enough to make a difference anyway.
translation.es: No tan rápido para que importe.

translation.en: The fuck you doing, Gorski?
Hey. What's your name, kid?
- Deshawn. - Deshawn, I'm Will.
I need you to press this as hard as you can.
translation.es: Necesito que pongas tanta presión aquí como puedas.

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, hey. Press as hard as you can.
translation.es: Oye. Presiona tan fuerte como puedas.

translation.en: - Are you kidding me? - [Will grunts]
I know you, Diego. You do not want to stand there and let this kid die either.
translation.es: Te conozco, Diego. No quieres quedarte ahí parado y dejar que muera.

translation.en: That's what he'd do if it was you or me.
translation.es: Es lo que haría él con nosotros.

translation.en: Goddamnit.
Fifty-eight minutes.
Fuck.
What's this?
We're throwing in the towel?
I need a break.
Hey, you understand we got less than an hour,
translation.es: Tenemos menos de una hora a menos que me equivoque y Steiner llegue temprano,

translation.en: unless I'm wrong and Steiner's early, then we got less than that.
translation.es: Tenemos menos de una hora a menos que me equivoque y Steiner llegue temprano, entonces tenemos menos tiempo.

translation.en: You're never wrong about shit like that.
translation.es: Nunca te equivocas sobre esas cosas.

translation.en: - [dance music plays on TV] - [audience cheers]
Really?
It relaxes me.
This shit relaxes you?
- Hang on. - [tires screeching]
- [Will] You OK? - Just a little cold.
translation.es: - ¿Estás bien? - Tengo un poco de frío.

translation.en: [boy] This your first time in the back seat, Will?
translation.es: ¿Es tu primera vez en el asiento trasero, Will?

translation.en: I've been back here more times than I care to admit.
translation.es: He estado aquí más veces de las que me gustaría admitir.

translation.en: [groans] Are you some sort of gangsta cop or somethin'?
translation.es: He estado aquí más veces de las que me gustaría admitir. ¿Eres un policía pandillero o algo así?

translation.en: Old man's police. Had my fair share of teenage rebellion, I guess.
translation.es: Mi viejo era policía. Supongo que tuve rebeldía adolescente.

translation.en: Never met my dad. He was shot before I was born.
translation.es: Yo no conocí a mi papá. Lo mataron antes de que naciera.

translation.en: This girl, she's really good.
Her name's Natalie. I watched her last week.
translation.es: Se llama Natalie. La vi la semana pasada.

translation.en: She sings like a musical instrument.
She uses a language of pure emotion.
translation.es: Usa un lenguaje de emoción pura.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, she's good.
- She's never gonna win. - Why?
Her eyes are too close together. She looks like a camel.
translation.es: Tiene los ojos muy pegados. Parece un camello.

translation.en: [Wolfgang] Shut up.
Camel's never gonna win.
Never.
- [low murmurs in audience] - [woman whispers] Wolfgang.
- [sighs] - Told you.
Emergency! Kid's bleeding bad here.
- That's a gunshot. - Yeah, I know.
translation.es: - Es una herida de bala. - Sí, lo sé.

translation.en: - I'm sorry, we can't treat that here. - What?
Are you new? You need to go and get an ambulance and take him to Mt. Sinai.
translation.es: ¿Acaso es nuevo? Tiene que llevarlo en ambulancia hasta Mt. Sinai.

translation.en: The kid's gonna be dead before we get there.
translation.es: El chico morirá antes de que lleguemos.

translation.en: - I'm sorry. It's policy. - What kind of policy lets a kid die?
translation.es: El chico morirá antes de que lleguemos. - Son las reglas. - ¿Qué tipo de regla deja morir a un niño?

translation.en: We were losing so many resources to gunshots,
translation.es: Perdíamos tantos recursos por heridos de bala

translation.en: we couldn't take care of all the other patients that needed help around here.
translation.es: que no podíamos cuidar de los demás que necesitaban ayuda.

translation.en: We've been a better hospital since we stopped taking kids like him.
translation.es: Desde que dejamos de admitir a niños como él, somos un mejor hospital.

translation.en: - [boy panting] - [Will] Please.
That's it.
Fuck. It's over. Hey.
Shit.
It's Steiner! We gotta go.
Hey, Wolfgang.
Please.
He's going to fucking kill us.
I don't want to die!
- You cracked the uncrackable. - [sighs]
You did it.
Dr. Manno just came out of surgery. Life signs are stable.
translation.es: El Dr. Manno acaba de salir de cirugía. Sus signos vitales son estables.

translation.en: He'll probably make it.
Thanks.
Can I ask you a personal question?
If he lives and he kills someone, let's say a cop,
translation.es: Si él vive y mata a alguien, como un policía por ejemplo,

translation.en: how you gonna feel about that?
You all right?
You're sweating.
- Your pulse is racing. - I'm fine.
translation.es: - Tienes el pulso acelerado. - Estoy bien.

translation.en: You're scared.
You needn't be.
You're so beautiful.
I don't just mean in a physical way.
translation.es: No me refiero solo en lo físico.

translation.en: The warmth... pouring out of your heart.
translation.es: La calidez... rebosando de tu corazón.

translation.en: Even though you work hard to hide it.
translation.es: Aunque te esfuerzas mucho por ocultarlo.

translation.en: You don't belong with these men.
translation.es: Tu lugar no es con ellos.

translation.en: You know it's true.
Don't you?
I used to be like you.
Like an exposed nerve of a broken tooth.
translation.es: ...como el nervio expuesto de un diente roto.

translation.en: I used anything I could to insulate.
translation.es: Usé todo cuanto podía para aislarme.

translation.en: Music... books... booze.
Anything I could to keep myself separate from the rest of the world.
translation.es: Cualquier cosa que me mantuviera separado del resto del mundo.

translation.en: Eventually I felt protected, you know, I...
I felt safe.
But also...
I never felt so... completely alone.
Then one day a friend, she gave me a gift.
translation.es: Y luego un día una amiga me dio un obsequio.

translation.en: She took away my armor.
She tore down my walls.
Her gift... it reminded me
translation.es: Su obsequio... me recordó lo que se sentía,

translation.en: what it felt like... to be alive.
translation.es: Su obsequio... me recordó lo que se sentía, estar vivo.

translation.en: What did she give you?
This.
- Stop the car. - Hm?
- I said stop the car! - What the fuck?
This is where it happened.
What happened?
It's where she killed herself.
[mutters] Shit.
This is it.
Ah, hell no.
This wasn't a dream.
Of all the partners, I end up with a Mulder-wannabe.
translation.es: De todos los compañeros, me tocó estar con un Mulder.

translation.en: - D, a woman killed herself right here. - Where's the blood, Will?
translation.es: - D, una mujer se suicidó aquí. - ¿Dónde está la sangre, Will?

translation.en: Maybe she only shot herself in the fifth dimension,
translation.es: Quizá solo se disparó en la quinta dimensión,

translation.en: so we can't see the blood.
OK, I've never been here before.
translation.es: Bueno, nunca he estado aquí antes.

translation.en: I know about this.
Drugs.
There's a gun, too.
There's shit everywhere, man. Look, you're freakin' me out.
translation.es: Hay cosas en todas partes. Mira, me estás perturbando.

translation.en: Show me evidence of a crime, and you got me.
translation.es: Si me muestras la evidencia de un crimen, me convencerás.

translation.en: So, until then, do your little séance, and I'll be in the car. All right?
translation.es: Hasta entonces, me quedaré en el auto mientras haces tu sesión espiritista, ¿sí?

translation.en: This is where she died.
Did you know her?
How do you know she died here?
I saw her.
Do you live here?
Where do you live?
London.
What are you doing here?
I don't know.
I don't know where I am.
Chicago, near South Side.
translation.es: En Chicago, cerca de la zona sur.

translation.en: In America?
I've never been to America.
translation.es: Nunca he estado en los EE.UU.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, no! What are you doing?
- Don't you fucking move! - [gasping]
- Stop. - Open the fucking safe!
Why are you doing this?
He has just had a shipment come in, and me and Nocker have been trackin' it.
translation.es: Acaba de recibir un cargamento, y Nocker y yo lo hemos estado siguiendo.

translation.en: We were gonna hit him yesterday, but he wanted you here.
translation.es: Íbamos a dar el golpe ayer, pero él te quiso aquí.

translation.en: Now, a smart guy like you... probably has a gun in there.
translation.es: Un tipo listo como tú seguramente tiene un arma ahí adentro.

translation.en: - [gasps] Don't hurt him. - Oh, yeah.
Is that why you came? 'Cause you wanna-- Do you wanna fuck him?
translation.es: ¿Es por eso que viniste? ¿Porque quieres cogértelo?

translation.en: Riles, he will kill you without blinking if I didn't have this.
translation.es: Riles, te mataría sin siquiera pensarlo si no tuviera esto.

translation.en: - I fuckin' told you. Here. - I have to go.
translation.es: - Te lo dije. Toma. - Tengo que irme.

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. Riley. You're not-- You're not going anywhere.
translation.es: No. No irás a ningún lado.

translation.en: - You're part of this. No, no, no. - [panting] Let me go.
translation.es: - Eres parte de esto. - Déjame ir.

translation.en: Riles, Riles... this is the break that we've been waiting for.
translation.es: No. Riles, esta es la oportunidad que estábamos esperando.

translation.en: Fill it up.
Fill it up!
Riles, this is our chance.
You said that you wanted to go to America. We wanted a different life.
translation.es: Dijiste que querías ir a los EE.UU. Queríamos una vida diferente.

translation.en: That's-- That's what you said, right?
